keyMoments.title: Fen Bock's Debut
keyMoments.description: Fen Bock appears as one of Caesar's satyr henchmen, fighting against the G-5 Marines with his gourd-shaped mace.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of Caesar's transformed subordinates who lost his legs in the chemical weapon incident and was given sheep legs.

abilities.description: Fen Bock fights with a mace shaped like a gourd with two spiked balls attached to it.

relationships.description: Fen Bock works as a henchman for Caesar Clown, who rescued him after the chemical weapon incident and gave him new legs.

reveals.information: Former prisoner who lost his legs in Caesar's chemical weapon incident and was given sheep legs through Law's powers

keyMoments.title: Chappe's Debut
keyMoments.description: Chappe appears as one of Caesar's centaur henchmen, fighting the G-5 Marines with his rope whip. He was transformed into a centaur with cow legs.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces another of Caesar's subordinates and demonstrates the results of Law's surgical abilities combined with Caesar's experiments.

abilities.description: Chappe wields a rope whip in combat and is very proficient in using it.

relationships.description: Chappe is very loyal to Caesar Clown, calling him 'Master'. Caesar rescued him after the laboratory accident and gave him new legs.

reveals.information: Former prisoner who lost his legs in Caesar's chemical weapon incident and was given cow legs through Law's powers

keyMoments.title: Luffy Destroys Spike Trap with Busoshoku Haki
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Armament Haki to destroy the Yeti Cool Brothers' icicle spike trap, demonstrating his post-timeskip mastery of Haki.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's proficiency with Armament Haki, a crucial ability for surviving in the New World.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Gomu Gomu no Elephant Gun
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Elephant Gun for the first time in the anime, combining Gear Third with Armament Haki to create a powerful black-colored giant fist attack.
keyMoments.significance: Debuts one of Luffy's signature post-timeskip techniques that becomes a staple move throughout future arcs.

keyMoments.title: Receives Law's Alliance Proposal
keyMoments.description: Law proposes forming a pirate alliance to take down one of the Four Emperors, setting the stage for future arcs.
keyMoments.significance: This alliance proposal is one of the most important moments in the series, leading to the Dressrosa and Wano arcs.

abilities.description: A Gear Third technique enhanced with Armament Haki. Luffy inflates his arm to create a giant black fist and delivers a devastating punch.

reveals.information: Can use Gomu Gomu no Elephant Gun, combining Gear Third with Armament Haki

name.japanese: トラファルガー・D・ワーテル・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law Defeats Scotch with Counter Shock
keyMoments.description: Law uses his Ope Ope no Mi powers to slice Scotch in half and finish him with Counter Shock, a powerful electrical attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's combat prowess and his Ope Ope no Mi abilities, showing why he's a valuable ally.

keyMoments.title: Proposes Pirate Alliance to Luffy
keyMoments.description: Law proposes forming a pirate alliance with Luffy to take down one of the Four Emperors, explaining the harsh realities of surviving in the New World.
keyMoments.significance: This alliance proposal is the catalyst for the next several major arcs and fundamentally changes the power dynamics of the New World.
keyMoments.quote: There are two ways to survive in the New World: going under an Emperor or attempting to fight them.

abilities.description: Law places his hands on his opponent and releases a powerful electrical shock similar to a defibrillator, neutralizing them.

relationships.description: Law proposes a pirate alliance with Luffy to take down one of the Four Emperors.

evolutionMoments.description: Law formally proposes the alliance after saving Nami from the Yeti Cool Brothers.

reveals.information: Can use Counter Shock, a powerful electrical attack from his Ope Ope no Mi
Plans to take down one of the Four Emperors and knows of a key on Punk Hazard that can upset the balance of the New World
